_sText: UPDATE: Added optimized nav file powered by Chizbone. Title: Oil Refinery Release Date: 07, 27th,2008 Filename: de_oilfine.bsp ,de_oilfine.txt ,de_oilfine.nav Author: M@ster's: rogeriobsp2 at gmail.com Description: Half-Life2 Counter-Strike Source Map ================================ --- Play Information --- Level Name: Oil Refinery Single Player: No Cooperative: yes Deathmatch: ? Difficulty Settings: No New Sounds: No New Graphics: yes Known bugs: ? Map Nacionality: BRAZILIAN --- History --- Counter-Terrorists: Prevent Terrorists from bombing vital point of refinery. Team members must defuse any bombs that threaten targeted areas. Terrorists: The Terrorist carrying the C4 must destroy one of the vital point of refinery. Installation ------------ Unzip the all files into your (...\Steam\SteamApps\(Your Steam Name)\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps) directory ================================== THANKYOU Counter-Strike Source Mod and Valve software for making TF2, HL2 ,CS:s and DOD:S Additional Thanks: MIB Mamus http://www.leveldesign.com.br/ ********YOU for the download :)******** *==============================* * If you like this map or hate this map, please email me with your* * comments at the e-mail address above. * *===============================* COPYRIGHT INFORMATION Oil Refinery is copyright 2008. You MUST NOT distribute this level UNLESS you INCLUDE THIS FILE WITH NO MODIFICATIONS! Authors MAY NOT use this level as a base to build additional levels. This BSP may be distributed ONLY over the Internet and/or Valve methods. ============================== PS: Brazil it isn't just Amazonia and Rio de Janeiro for you that believe in this crap. ==============================
